data.title: Adarsh Nair, the CEO of Airtel Digital, has left the business after five years. After working for Airtel for five years, Nair was #promoted...
data.meta_description:
2 likes, 0 comments - viestories_com on November 4, 2023: "Adarsh Nair, the CEO of Airtel Digital, has left the business after five years. After working for Airtel for five years, Nair was #promoted to Director of Airtel Digital around four months ago.

Digital services are provided by Bharti Airtel’s #subsidiary, Airtel Digital. Additionally, Nair oversaw the company’s products as its chief.

Nair developed the financial apps Airtel Finance, Xstream video app, cloud communication platform Airtel IQ, and Airtel IOT #platform, and also scaled the Wynk Music app to 75 million users, according to his LinkedIn profile.

Nair’s letter of resignation states that he intends to go to the United States early in the #new year.

Read more - https://viestories.com/airtel-digital-ceo-adarsh-nair-quits/

To share your startup story write us on - startup@viestories.com

#airtel #airteldigital #adarshnair".
